channel.title: Zabbix - 标签 - 一个曾经的小码农...
channel.description: Zabbix - 标签 - 一个曾经的小码农...

item.title: Zabbix安装(这是一个草稿)
item.description: pwgen 18 1GRANT ALL PRIVILEGES ON . TO ‘root’@’%’ Identified by “k22gve2rSgUTArEd”; GRANT ALL PRIVILEGES ON . TO ‘root’@‘127.0.0.1’ Identified by “k22gve2rSgUTArEd” WITH GRANT OPTION; GRANT ALL PRIVILEGES ON . TO ‘root’@’localhost’ Identified by “k22gve2rSgUTArEd” WITH GRANT OPTION; wget “https://cdn.zabbix.com/zabbix/sources/stable/4.0/zabbix-4.0.26.tar.gz" tar -xzf zabbix-4.0.26.tar.gz && cd zabbix-4.0.26/ yum -y install curl libcurl-devel net-snmp net-snmp-devel perl-DBI libdbi-dbd-mysql mysql-devel gcc make libxml2 libxml2-devel libevent-devel ./configure –prefix=/opt/zabbix-3.4.15 –enable-server –enable-agent –enable-java –with-mysql –enable-ipv6 –with-net-snmp –with-libcurl
